country-code.description: Country code in text format (e.g., US)

country-code-numeric.description: Country code as per the E.164 numbering plan (e.g., +1)

national-destination-code.description: National destination code as per the E.164 numbering plan (e.g., 415)

subscriber-number.description: Subscriber number as per the E.164 numbering plan (e.g., 5552671)

text.description: Description or additional information about the phone number.

description: Phone number based on the E.164 international public telecommunication numbering plan
name: phone-number
